评论详情: Not a welder by trade, I just keep this shirt in my service truck for when I’m using the torches. Nice and lightweight and it saves me from getting a bunch of little burns on my arms.

The shirt is a solid FR shirt doesn’t have holes burnt into it too easy and has a good snap design. The bad part is the sizing is just plain weird I got a XL originally and it fit like a 3x or 4x so I went down one size to a L and that fit like a medium the sleeve length was good but the bottom of the shirt seemed to taper in to the point where it looked like I was squeezing into it, maybe for someone who’s more slender it would fit right but not if you’re on the bigger side. Also I’m pretty sure they say they are pre shrunk but that is not true my wife put it through the dryer by accident and now it’s just plain uncomfortable to wear since I had to downsize and the shirt was just barley comfortable to wear in the first place. I wish they fit better because it’s a decently priced FR shirt but unfortunately the size doesn’t work for me so I will not be buying again.
Lightweight, perfect for summer .

I recently purchased the BOCOMAL FR Shirt and overall, I'm quite impressed with its performance and comfort. Here are some key points from my experience:  **Pros:**  1. **Lightweight and Comfortable**: At 6.25oz, the shirt is impressively lightweight, which is a huge plus during long work hours. It doesn't feel heavy or cumbersome, and the fabric is soft enough to be worn comfortably throughout the day.  3. **Durability**: The stitching and overall construction of the shirt seem very durable. After several washes, it has retained its shape and integrity, which is crucial for any workwear.  4. **Design and Fit**: The shirt has a decent fit—not too tight, not too loose. It provides enough room for movement without feeling baggy. The buttons and pockets are well-placed and functional.  **Cons:**  1. **Breathability**: While the shirt is lightweight, it could use better breathability. I found myself getting quite warm during intense work sessions, especially in a hot environment. It would be great if there were more ventilated areas or moisture-wicking properties.  Overall, the BOCOMAL FR Shirt is a solid choice for anyone in need of reliable flame-resistant workwear. It strikes a good balance between protection and comfort, making it a worthwhile investment for welders and other professionals in similar fields. With a few minor improvements, it could easily become a 5-star product.

Perhaps ur a bigger gutted guy it would be fine. I’m a size 32 waist and thinner stomach. Lots and lots of room. All in all it’s a pretty good shirt for the price. I’m thinks about buying more colors in the future.

评论概述: Good fit at a great price
评论详情: I honestly believe FR is snake oil and an unnecessary requirement for lots of folks since all FR rated gear is never truly FR, and loses its resistance the more you wash/use it. That being said, this shirt is great. It’s of well made material, comfortable fit (not loose for things to snag), and sizing was on the money for me. I will continue to buy these shirts, as the price is unmatchable in regards to FR stamp and overall quality. It’s a shirt that will see a lot of work, so we’ll see how it holds up against these “instagram welder” companies. Definitely recommend.

Order this shirt and the tan one for welding. They both claim to be 6.25 oz but there is a pretty drastic difference in weight and feel between the red and blue plaid pattern and the plain tan one. I purchased these for the lighter weight fire retardant but there is nothing good about it’s fit. The collar fits weird very high on the neck and it’s very scratchy even after washing, the cuffs have to be unbuttoned to get your hands through and the buttons have a very fragile feel, the breast pockets are unusually far apart and hard to button with one hand. I usually wear bulwark shirts was looking for something lighter and less expensive so I guess you get what you pay for.

Overall a great shirt for the price I’m a 5’10 183 lb man I usually wear a size Large but reading previous reviews I decided to size down to a medium great fitment it’s a little long on the torso but that’s fine because I got to tuck my shirt in it’s not tight on the sleeves or wrist and it gives me good mobility the material isn’t too heavy or thick, overall not bad for the price definitely recommend to get yourself some.
